1._comment: do not appear with this name in JSON
1.name: Identifier
1.help: Unique string that identifies the resource

2.name: Creator
2.help: Main researchers involved / author of publication in priority order

creatorName.help: Full name of the creator - family, given

2.2.name: givenName
2.2.help: The personal or first name of the creator

2.3.name: familyName
2.3.help: The surname or last name of the creator

2.4.name: nameIdentifier
2.4.help: Uniquely identifies an individual or legal entity, according to various schemes.

2.4.a.name: nameIdentifierScheme
2.4.a.help: The name of the name identifier scheme.

2.4.b.name: schemeURI
2.4.b.help: The URI of the name identifier scheme.

2.5.name: affiliation
2.5.help: The organizational or institutional affiliation of the creator.

2.5.a.name: affiliationIdentifier
2.5.a.help: Uniquely identifies the organizational affiliation of the creator.

2.5.b.name: affiliationIdentifierScheme
2.5.b.help: The name of the affiliation identifier scheme

2.5.c.name: schemeURI
2.5.c.help: The URI of the affiliation identifier scheme.

3.name: Title
3.help: name or title by which resource is known - title of a dataset, name of software or instrument

3.a.name: titleType
3.a.help: The type of Title (other than the Main Title)

4.name: Publisher
4.help: The name of the entity that holds, archives, publishes, prints, distributes, releases, issues, or produces the resource.

4.a.name: publisherIdentifier
4.a.help: Uniquely identifies the publisher, according to various schemes.

4.b.name: publisherIdentifierScheme
4.b.help: The name of the publisher identifier scheme.

4.c.name: schemeURI
4.c.help: The URI of the publisher identifier scheme.

5.name: PublicationYear
5.help: The year when the data was or will be made publicly available. - YYYY

10.a.name: resourceTypeGeneral
10.a.help: The general type of the resource.

6.name: Subject
6.help: Subject, keyword, classification code, or key phrase describing the resource.

6.a.name: subjectScheme
6.a.help: The name of the subject scheme or classification code or authority if one is used.

6.b.name: schemeURI
6.b.help: The URI of the subject identifier scheme.

6.c.name: valueURI
6.c.help: The URI of the subject term.

6.d.name: classificationCode
6.d.help: The classification code used for the subject term in the subject scheme.

7.name: Contributor
7.help: The institution or person responsible for collecting, managing, distributing, or otherwise contributing to the development of the resource.

7.a.name: contributorType
7.a.help: The type of contributor of the resource.

7.1.name: contributorName
7.1.help: The full name of the contributor.

7.2.name: givenName
7.2.help: The personal or first name of the contributor.

7.3.name: familyName
7.3.help: The surname or last name of the contributor.

7.4.name: nameIdentifier
7.4.help: Uniquely identifies an individual or legal entity, according to various schemes.

7.4.a.name: nameIdentifierScheme
7.4.a.help: The name of the name identifier scheme.

7.4.b.name: schemeURI
7.4.b.help: The URI of the name identifier scheme.

7.5.name: affiliation
7.5.help: The organizational or institutional affiliation of the contributor.

7.5.a.name: affiliationIdentifier
7.5.a.help: Uniquely identifies the organizational affiliation of the contributor.

7.5.b.name: affiliationIdentifierScheme
7.5.b.help: The name of the affiliation identifier scheme.

7.5.c.name: schemeURI
7.5.c.help: URI of the affiliation identifier scheme.

8.name: Date
8.help: Different dates relevant to the work.

8.b.name: dateInformation
8.b.help: Specific information about the date, if appropriate.

12.name: RelatedIdentifier
12.help: Identifiers of related resources. These must be globally unique identifiers.

12.b.name: relationType
12.b.help: Description of the relationship of the resource being registered (A) and the related resource (B).

12.e.name: schemeType
12.e.help: The type of the relatedMetadataScheme, linked with the schemeURI.

12.f.name: resourceTypeGeneral
12.f.help: The general type of the related resource.

17.name: Description
17.help: All additional information that does not fit in any of the other categories. May be used for technical information or detailed information associated with a scientific instrument.

18.name: GeoLocation
18.help: Spatial region or named place where the data was gathered or about which the data is focused.

18.1.1.name: pointLongitude
18.1.1.help: Longitudinal dimension of point expressed in decimal degrees (positive east).

18.1.2.name: pointLatitude
18.1.2.help: Latitudinal dimension of point expressed in decimal degrees (positive north).

18.2.name: geoLocationBox
18.2.help: The spatial limits of a box using WGS84 coordinates in decimal numbers.

18.4.name: geoLocationPolygon
18.4.help: A drawn polygon area, defined by a set of points and lines connecting the points in a closed chain.

18.4.1.name: polygonPoint
18.4.1.help: A point location in a polygon. There must be at least 4 non-aligned points to make a closed curve, with the last point described the same as the first point.

18.4.1.1.name: pointLongitude
18.4.1.1.help: Longitudinal dimension of point expressed in decimal degrees (positive east).

18.4.1.2.name: pointLatitude
18.4.1.2.help: Latitudinal dimension of point expressed in decimal degrees (positive north).

18.4.2.name: inPolygonPoint
18.4.2.help: For any bound area that is larger than half the earth, define a (random) point inside.

18.4.2.1.name: pointLongitude
18.4.2.1.help: Longitudinal dimension of point expressed in decimal degrees (positive east).

18.4.2.2.name: pointLatitude
18.4.2.2.help: Latitudinal dimension of point expressed in decimal degrees (positive north).

9.name: Language
9.help: The primary language of the resource.

11.name: AlternateIdentifier
11.help: An identifier other than the primary Identifier applied to the resource being registered.

13.name: Size
13.help: Size (e.g., bytes, pages, inches, etc.) or duration (extent), e.g., hours, minutes, days, etc., of a resource.

15.name: Version
15.help: The version number of the resource.

16.name: Rights
16.help: Any rights information for this resource.

16.b.name: rightsIdentifier
16.b.help: A short, standardized version of the license name.

19.name: FundingReference
19.help: Information about financial support (funding) for the resource being registered.

19.2.name: funderIdentifier
19.2.help: Uniquely identifies a funding entity, according to various types.

19.3.name: awardNumber
19.3.help: The code assigned by the funder to a sponsored award (grant).

19.3.a.name: awardURI
19.3.a.help: The URI leading to a page provided by the funder for more information about the award (grant).

19.4.name: awardTitle
19.4.help: The human readable title or name of the award (grant).

20.name: RelatedItem
20.help: Information about a resource related to the one being registered.

20.a.name: relatedItemType
20.a.help: The general type of the related item.

20.b.name: relationType
20.b.help: Description of the relationship of the resource being registered (A) and the related item (B).

20.1.name: relatedItemIdentifier
20.1.help: The identifier for the related item.

20.1.a.name: relatedItemIdentifierType
20.1.a.help: The type of the Identifier for the related item.

20.1.d.name: schemeType
20.1.d.help: The type of the relatedMetadataScheme, linked with the schemeURI.

20.2.name: creator
20.2.help: The institution or person responsible for creating the related resource.

20.2.1.name: creatorName
20.2.1.help: The full name of the related item creator.

20.2.2.name: givenName
20.2.2.help: The personal or first name of the creator.

20.2.3.name: familyName
20.2.3.help: The surname or last name of the creator.

20.3.a.name: titleType
20.3.a.help: Type of the related item title. Use this sub-property to add a subtitle, translation, or alternate title to the main title.

20.4.name: publicationYear
20.4.help: The year when the item was or will be made publicly available.

20.6.name: issue
20.6.help: Issue number or name of the related item.

20.7.name: number
20.7.help: Number of the resource within the related item, e.g., report number or article number.

20.7.a.name: numberType
20.7.a.help: Type of the related items number, e.g., report number or article number.

20.8.name: firstPage
20.8.help: First page of the resource within the related item, e.g., of the chapter, article, or conference paper in proceedings.

20.9.name: lastPage
20.9.help: Last page of the resource within the related item, e.g., of the chapter, article, or conference paper in proceedings.

20.10.name: publisher
20.10.help: The name of the entity that holds, archives, publishes prints, distributes, releases, issues, or produces the resource.

20.11.name: edition
20.11.help: Edition or version of the related item.

20.12.name: Contributor
20.12.help: An institution or person identified as contributing to the development of the resource.

20.12.a.name: contributorType
20.12.a.help: The type of contributor of the resource.

20.12.1.name: contributorName
20.12.1.help: The full name of the related item contributor.

20.12.2.name: givenName
20.12.2.help: The personal or first name of the contributor.

20.12.3.name: familyName
20.12.3.help: The surname or last name of the contributor.
